pros:
AJR is the only agency that are genuinely passionate about the work they do and conducts all business in an ethical manner. 

AJR offers competitive salaries, commission, and benefits - not to mention, working in the best trendy office space. 

Management are awesome, the team is awesome. You will be well fed!
cons: There are no cons - they're great.

pros: Well organised company, attentive manager, no unnecessary processes, opportunity for autonomy, great relationships with clients. A fun place to work, with good people and an honest and transparent approach, which is exactly what a recruitment firm needs.
cons: One would imagine a small company like this would not have a particularly strong presence in the charity sector, but Ashby and her team have many years' experience between them, and have a great reputation with a huge amount of clients.
